channel.title: Review on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Review on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Year in review 2020
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Well… I don’t really know where to start this time. 2020 was quite the rollercoaster, with many downs… but fortunately also a few amazing ups. Let’s focus on the good stuff.

item.title: Year in review 2019
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Getting up without being rushed, cycling my kids to school, cooking healthy salads for lunch, kids running into my arms when they get home… I’m quite happy with my new daily routine!

item.title: Year in review 2018
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Sitting in our own couch, in our own house, kids safely asleep upstairs,… The road here was brutal, but the result is extraordinary. The past year was (hopefully) the busiest year of my entire life.

item.title: Year in review 2017
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: For the first time ever I have my year in review ready in time. I’m sure I’ll never forget 2017. Not only did we start building our dream house, but more importantly, our family grew to 4 people!

item.title: Year in review 2016
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: It’s that time of the year again to do a little personal retrospective. 2016 passed by so quickly! I had a fantastic time playing around with (and taking care of) my wife and daughter.

item.title: Year in review 2015
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Finally found the time to write my year in review. #insomnia 2015 was a huge year for me! I even dare to say the biggest one of my life so far as I became a father of a lovely daughter Lene.
